function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased urbanization leading to limited understanding of urban health and disparities","Impact":"Greater risk for adverse health consequences and disparities in urban populations","Mitigation":"Invest in research and data collection to better understand urban health and disparities","Technologies":"Urban health monitoring systems, data analytics, and predictive modeling","People":"Socially disadvantaged individuals living in urban settings","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Creation of urban heat islands (UHIs) due to greenhouse gas production and urbanization","Impact":"Exacerbation of extreme temperature conditions, air pollution, and poor water quality","Mitigation":"Increase green spaces, use sustainable building materials, and reduce greenhouse gas emissions","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, sustainable urban planning, and renewable energy","People":"Urban residents, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"City planners, urban developers, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Local-scale variation in UHI intensity due to urban geometry","Impact":"Differences in UHI intensity at a very local scale, affecting specific urban areas differently","Mitigation":"Urban design interventions and planning to optimize shading, ventilation, and thermal comfort","Technologies":"Urban design simulation tools, advanced architectural techniques, and climate-responsive building designs","People":"Residents of specific urban areas with varying UHI intensity","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, and local government"}]}
